name: Match'em Colors
description:
The goal is to remove all colored cubes on the top side of the playfield. There are 6 different colors. On the bottom side of the playfield is a special which can be moved around the playfield by flipping it over. Each of its 6 sides represents one of the 6 colors. Whatever color is on top will color thewhole cube. A cube above gets removed when the cube below is positioned beneath and shows the same color.

You can flip the whole playfield. This will reveal the upper side for 3 seconds before the playfield flips back.
